--- Switchblade / Astroblast / Abominus ---

Switchblade is standing in the control room. He glances back, 
returns to his work of moving the Dark Avian. The side thrusters fire 
slightly, nudging the ship, and it's passengers to the right slightly 
as the large vessel steadily moves past the southerly tip of the 
Baffin Islands. Seeing that the newcommer is looking confused, he 
pops a few words back, "What's crack'n--" His chair spins around 
once, and returns to where it started, giving Switchblade a good 
view of who he was talking to, "--Ragnus?" (In other words, he said 
"What's crack'n Ragnus?") =)

>|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  

Astroblast smiles as the mighty figure known as Abominus forms 
near him, dwarfing the much smaller bot. He mutters to himself in 
anticipation, "Abominus..." Then he gives out the orders, 
"Abominus. Walk, into, the, water." He continues, going nice and 
slow so the stupid bot understands at least some of what is being 
said. "Swim, (or sink I guess) downward, until, you, reach, Stratus, 
and, listen, and, obey, his, orders." Astroblast finishes having 
become somewhat irritated at this procedure. 

Abominus growls, "Grrrr, Abominus.... crush...." the stupid bot 
looks at Astroblast menacingly, but decides to follow the 
instructions provided. " Abominus... walk.... sw... swi.... 
crusssshhhh...." The stupid bot enters the water.

He opens a commlink to Stratus, "Stratus, I'm sending Abominus 
down to you," He says as Abominus enters the water in the 
direction that Stratus had went, "Order him to loosen the ship, and 
bring it to the surface. He strength should be able to do the job. 
The ship will have slight flotation properties. Oh, and remember, 
keep your sentences short and slow, VERY slow so the stupid bot 
understands. Astroblast out." He closes the commlink and by that 
time, Abominus had completely submersed himself and was 
traveling downward to Stratus



On 3 Aug 2001, at 20:14, ragnus_@... wrote:

>   Ragnus slowly made his way to the command section of the base, his
> joints still slightly stiff from lack of use.  As he arrived he gazed
> around the room looking for someone who could fill him in on what has
> happened in the last litle bit.
> 
> OOC:
> Anybody at the TRUE decepticon base?  If there is reply...I may have
> seen you in the halls or something...
